Name: Andersen-Tawil syndrome
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance of a mutation in the KCNJ2 gene which disrupts the rhythm of the heart's lower chambers (ventricular arrhythmia) and results_in an unusually small lower jaw (micrognathia)

Name: long QT syndrome 1
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the KCNQ1 gene on chromosome 11p15.5-p15.4.
Synonym: ventricular fibrillation with prolonged QT interval

Name: long QT syndrome 2
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the KCNH2 gene on chromosome 7q36.1.

Name: long QT syndrome 3
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the SCN5A gene on chromosome 3p22.2.

Name: long QT syndrome 5
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the KCNE1 gene on chromosome 21q22.12.

Name: long QT syndrome 6
Definition: A long QT interval syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the KCNE2 gene on chromosome 21q22.11.

Name: obsolete Timothy syndrome
Definition: A long QT interval syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the KCNE2 gene on chromosome 21q22.11.

Name: long QT syndrome 9
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in mutation of the CAV3 gene on chromosome 3p25.3.

Name: long QT syndrome 10
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the SCN4B gene on chromosome 11q23.3.

Name: long QT syndrome 11
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the AKAP9 gene on chromosome 7q21.2.

Name: long QT syndrome 12
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the SNTA1 gene on chromosome 20q11.21.

Name: long QT syndrome 13
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the KCNJ5 gene on chromosome 11q24.3.

Name: long QT syndrome 14
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the CALM1 gene on chromosome 14q32.11.

Name: long QT syndrome 15
Definition: A long QT syndrome that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance of mutation in the CALM2 gene on chromosome 2p21.

Name: Jervell-Lange Nielsen syndrome
Definition: A bronchial disease that is characterized by chronic inflammation and narrowing of the airways
